scripts.say: Visitors from Iron Blood, I bid you welcome to the Diadem of Light.
I am Noshiro, Agano-class light cruiser. I've been waiting for your arrival.
It is our honor as fellow members of the Crimson Axis to have been invited here.
On behalf of the Iron Blood, I would also like to express my words of gratitude to Lady Shinano and the people of the Sakura Empire.
We are glad to hear it. Now, if you would please follow me, I shall guide you to your accommodations for theâ€“
Pardon, but wasn't there a rule that calls for an opening performance of sorts? "Participants in the ritual must demonstrate their might as a show of respect," I believe?
That is correct. We do conduct exercise battles as a show of respect.
However, that is only required of citizens of the Sakura Empire. We will not force our guests to take part in such a thing.
That's quite a pity. I was so looking forward to immersing myself within the rich customs of the Sakura Empire.
That would be difficult to make happen...
Think of it as a favor to us. Surely the host wouldn't want their guests to miss out on an enjoyable activity, would they?
...Difficult, but not impossible. Without a doubt, a host's job is to make their guests feel welcome. And if that is what you desire, then we can do so.
However, I'm a little rusty, so you'll have to forgive me. Please brace yourselves for combat.
Hah, isn't this what you were hoping for to begin with?
In either case, I'm curious to see what you're made of, Noshiro...
